alert.note: Alert for Hemphill (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 8:24PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Hemphill County through 900 PM CDT... At 824 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles south of Lake Marvin, or 14 miles east of Canadian, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Marvin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
